reviews.text: The waiters were super nice but the food was nothing special. Both the lamb Chops and the grilled stuffed Turkey steak were dry. Be aware that you have to order a side dish for the main dishes, so it ends up being a bit expensive. The ravioli with spinach was ok but a bit small portion size. The seafood risotto was good.

The waiter was friendly, and the food was extremely good. They really put in the effort to prepare every dish. They deserve the best awards every year. I strongly recommend Lanterna na Dolcu for fine dining.

Definitely the best food that I had during my visit to Zagreb. I tried the Zagrebacki Odrezak with sweet potato, with strukli to start and a glass of red wine from Dalmatia. All were excellent and I left feeling stuffed. I arrived quite early but they let me have a drink in the bar before seating me in the restaurant. The staff were really friendly and made me feel very welcome. I was the only person there (it was a Monday lunchtime) but I am sure it gets busy in the evening.
This is an awesome place where u can eat and spend time! It has a special atmosphere, interesting design and very delicious food! I liked this place! If I have an occasion, I will return here.

Restoran Lanterna na Dolcu is a restaurant with a very cozy atmosphere located underground with tables outside. The service is quality and the food is excellent, as well as having a good wine list. I was in the city on business and I very much accepted the recommendation of the city's hosts.
